resources.string: Unleak allows you to reverse permissions accessed by third-party apps. See which apps are accessing your SMS, call logs, camera, and pictures, and take control.
Stay safe from harmful software. Unleak checks for malware and Trojans on your device, ensuring your data safety.
Get an overall security score for your mobile phone. Unleak analyzes your devices security and gives you a comprehensive score.
Know your apps better. Track the screen time and data usage of each app on your device with Unleak.
We will handle everything for you. As you have the app in your pocket then you do not have to worry about anything.
